message: Hello Bob, I'm interested in selling this product to you. I think it's a great opportunity for you to get a fantastic deal. I'm willing to sell it to you for $110.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking of something a bit more competitive. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $100?
I understand you're looking for a competitive price, but I've already discounted it from the original price. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'll offer it to you for $105.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my target price. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $98?
I'm not willing to go below $105, but I can see you're really interested in the product. I'll meet you at $102.50, and that's as low as I can go.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit above my target price. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $99?
